Description:
IN - 312380439 - You have failed to ensure your employees who are liable to be exposed to mild and stainless-steel weld fume, a substance hazardous to health, have been placed under suitable health surveillance, giving rise to the risk of serious personal ill health, namely lung cancer and occupational asthma.

IN - 312380457 - You have failed to ensure your KEMPER ProfiMast local exhaust ventilation (LEV) system which controls exposure to mild and stainless-steel weld fume has undergone a thorough examination and test by a competent person within the last fourteen months.

IN - 312380466 - You have failed to adequately control exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely wood dust generated from the operation of your Clarke table saw.
